body:
To partly answer my question.
There is an option to change to a different `variable_scope`. It is just confusing to use.
```python
with tf.variable_scope(
              tf.VariableScope(tf.AUTO_REUSE, 'shared'), reuse=tf.AUTO_REUSE,
              auxiliary_name_scope=False):
```
This will always set the `variable_scope` to `shared` no matter what scope you are in.
